name: Don't Touch Me (itch) (NandaGiannotti)
description:
This is a prototype of the game Don't Touch Me.

The full version will be add later on, with the music, score table, characters perfils and others characters selection, initial animated screen, options table and content, credits, game over animated screen.

Don't Touch Me is a Infinity Run type game, where you must help an eyeball, Mr. Eyeball, to escape from hands that want to touch him.
